subject: Re: -[EVP-ITC] A new hack?
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1207001919
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi Frank,
 
The other Radio Shack 12-820 does not click on the am sweep.  It may  be 
small but it is quite efficient for its size.  It is just like the  12-469 in 
operation too.
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 3/31/2008 3:17:39 P.M. Central Daylight Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 
 


Yeah, I was playing with trying to get rid of the  clicking sound, and saw 
the VT pin. I found I could manually tune the radio  with a volume control, or 
pot, so I had to make a board for it with a  sweep generator. Now I wish I 
would have bought the shortwave version! Ahhhhh  Box 36! Of course, Olgra(old and 
grumpy wife) isn't too happy at paying  for a $25 radio that has just been 
gutted! 

BTW, external  tuning gets rid of the clicking, and the audio is surprisingly 
clear.  


Frank-S
